item.title: Design Trends Low Poli
item.description: Graphic design trends 2018: low poli design is still hot Everybody knows that trends can be hot for months, years and suddenly go away. Its necessary always to be up-to-date. Researchs and browse websites are a good wat to know what trend will be in use for the next year. In graphic design there are some trends this year that generate a buzz around. In this post we will talk about a specific trend that is largely appreciated and very artistic one.

item.title: Duotone Color Effect
item.description: The most trendy effect: Duotone Theres no bigger trend effect in web and apps those days than the doutone color effect. Searching for new ways get customers attention, Spotify and New York firm Collins mixed 2 trends of Design to find a final result. The first one is vibrant colors, which were used to show emotion in various ways that music can be expresed. The second one is minimalism, where brings the limited ideas for color palettes.
